00010 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_REF_STATIC_ARRAY_ALLOC_FAST_ALLOC_ER_2010_HPP
00011 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_REF_STATIC_ARRAY_ALLOC_FAST_ALLOC_ER_2010_HPP
00012 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/wrapper/wrapper.hpp>
00013 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/fusion/assign_array.hpp>
00014 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/static_array/interface.hpp>
00015 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/static_array/alloc/fast_alloc_fwd.hpp>
00016  
00017 namespace boost{
00018 namespace assign{
00019 namespace v2{
00020 namespace ref{
00021 namespace alloc_tag{
00022         struct fast_alloc{};
00023 }// alloc_tag
00024 namespace static_array_aux{ 
00025 
00026     template<std::size_t N,typename Tag, typename T>
00027     class fast_alloc 
00028         : public static_array_aux::interface<
00029                 N, Tag, T, fast_alloc<N,Tag,T> 
00030         >
00031     {
00032 
00033         typedef Tag assign_tag_;
00034         typedef typename ref::wrapper<assign_tag_,T> wrapper_;
00035         typedef boost::array<wrapper_,N> array_;
00036                 
00037         public:
00038 
00039         fast_alloc(){}  
00040 
00041         template<typename L>
00042         fast_alloc(const L& l){
00043             assign_array(
00044                 this->array,
00045                 l
00046             );  
00047         }       
00048         
00049         array_& impl(){ 
00050             return this->array;
00051         }
00052 
00053         array_ const & impl()const{ 
00054             return this->array;
00055         }
00056         
00057         protected:
00058         mutable array_ array;
00059         
00060     };
00061 
00062 }// static_array_aux
00063 }// ref
00064 }// v2
00065 }// assign
00066 }// boost
00067 
00068 #endif
